r.s: Find out the minimum version and the extensions required for a piece of code to run
r.d: PHP_CompatInfo will parse a file/folder/script/array to find out the minimum version and extensions required for it to run. Features advanced debug output which shows which functions require which version and CLI output script
r.n:
* bugs - fixed bug #8604 : notice undefined property (with CLI version)
* news - add two custom options to beautify output . split filename to 32 char max (limit full console_table to 80 columns) it can be reduce or expand . glue is a string to indicates that filename is splitted into multiline (any string length and char is allow)
* improvements - windows script launcher for CLI version is now protected for blanks into directory name. Something like "C:\Program Files\"
